channel.title: Growth on maoxunxing's life
channel.description: Recent content in Growth on maoxunxing's life

item.title: How to stand out
item.description: Last week, I attended a meeting. Now I will talk about some things I learned from the meeting. A guy who will leave Alibaba Group made a talk. He is a high level engineer, he really made something successful and had a strong influence on the company.I really appreciate what learned: The way to learn things better, collaborate more efficiently with your colleague, and be more successful with your product.

item.title: [Translation] How To Work Hard
item.description: Paul Graham 原文：http://paulgraham.com/hwh.html My summary: The essence of hard work is to not cheat yourself, to recognize your strengths, and to do what you love in your field.
